transforms.code:
def degrees_to_compass(degrees):
		directions = [
		    "N", "NNE", "NE", "ENE", 
		    "E", "ESE", "SE", "SSE", 
		    "S", "SSW", "SW", "WSW", 
		    "W", "WNW", "NW", "NNW"
		]
		index = int((degrees / 22.5) + 0.5) % 16
		return directions[index]
	degree_symbol = u''
	return str(value) + ' ' + degree_symbol+ ' ' + degrees_to_compass(value) + ')'
